mapper.select: select goods.id,goods.uid,goods.name,goods.goods_des des,goods.price,goods.type,goods.state, goods.location,goods.img1,goods.img2,goods.img3,goods.img4,goods.img5,goods.img6 ,goods.ratio, goods.browse,goods.create_time createTime,goods.update_time updateTime, user.avator,user.name userName from goods goods left join user on goods.uid = user.id where goods.is_deleted = 0 and goods.state = 1 order by goods.create_time desc limit ${(pageNumber-1)*pageSize},#{pageSize}

select goods.id ,goods.name,goods.img1 from goods join banner on goods.id = banner.gid where goods.is_deleted = 0 and goods.state =1 and banner.start_time < CURRENT_TIME and banner.end_time > CURRENT_TIME

select goods.id ,goods.name from goods join roll_text on goods.id = roll_text.gid where goods.is_deleted = 0 and goods.state =1 and roll_text.start_time < CURRENT_TIME and roll_text.end_time > CURRENT_TIME

select goods.id,goods.uid,goods.name,goods.goods_des des,goods.price,goods.type,goods.state, goods.location,goods.img1,goods.img2,goods.img3,goods.img4,goods.img5,goods.img6 , goods.browse,goods.create_time createTime,goods.update_time updateTime, user.avator,user.name userName,user.accid from goods goods left join user on goods.uid = user.id where goods.id = #{gid}
mapper.update: update goods set browse = browse + 1 where id = #{gid}
mapper.select: SELECT comment.id,comment.uid,comment.comment,comment.create_time,user.avator,user.name userName,comment.gid from comment,user,goods where comment.gid = goods.id and comment.uid = user.id and comment.is_delete = 0 and comment.gid = #{gid}

SELECT goods.id,goods.uid,goods.name,goods.goods_des des,goods.price,goods.type,goods.state, goods.location,goods.img1,goods.img2,goods.img3,goods.img4,goods.img5,goods.img6 ,goods.ratio, goods.browse,goods.create_time createTime,goods.update_time updateTime, user.avator,user.name userName FROM goods,user WHERE goods.uid = user.id and goods.is_deleted = 0 and goods.state =1 and MATCH(goods.name,goods.goods_des) AGAINST(#{param} IN BOOLEAN MODE)

select goods.id,goods.uid,goods.name,goods.goods_des des,goods.price,goods.type,goods.state, goods.location,goods.img1,goods.img2,goods.img3,goods.img4,goods.img5,goods.img6 ,goods.ratio, goods.browse,goods.create_time createTime,goods.update_time updateTime, user.avator,user.name userName from goods,user,focus where goods.uid = focus.focused_id and user.id = focus.focused_id and goods.is_deleted = 0 and goods.state = 1 and focus.focuser_id = #{uid} order by goods.create_time desc limit ${(pageNumber-1)*pageSize},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update goods set state = -1 where id = #{gid}

mapper.insert: insert into banner(gid,end_time) values (#{gid},date_add(now(), INTERVAL 1 day))
insert into roll_text(gid,end_time) values (#{gid},date_add(now(), INTERVAL 1 day))

mapper.update: update goods set state = #{state} where id = #{gid}

select count(report.gid) reportTimes,goods.id,goods.name,goods.goods_des des,goods.price,goods.type,goods.location,goods.img1,goods.img2,goods.img3,goods.img4,goods.img5,goods.img6 from goods,report where goods.id = report.gid and goods.state!=-1 and report.is_handled=0 group by report.gid limit ${(pageNumber-1)*pageSize},#{pageSize}
